name: Agricultural and Food Policy Research Centers
sub_agency_name: The Office of the Chief Economist
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: The project advanced an existing climate change model to look further into the future when accounting for greenhouse gas emissions. This is a step towards developing a tool that allows certain biofuel-related questions to be addressed over a time horizon of about 20 years.

The project developed a 10-year stochastic baseline which included updating supply/utilization, livestock, price, policy, and macroeconomic date in the international crops model and updating the Western States cow-calf, dairy, and hay models with livestock inventory, prices, macroeconomic data and adjusted for recent market developments.
